body:
Day 55 - 1333*
What? The "dragon" was just a nickname for his second personality? He was, in fact, not a furry? Then why call him "the dragon" like he is gonna transform into a dragon? Also, what kinda of "dragon" appears when having sex? Each time he masturbates, he calls "the dragon" to masturbate for him? Maybe even suck his dick.
1/10.
